import React from 'react' import "./SignPage.css" import HeaderBottom from '../../HeaderBottom/HeaderBottom' import Button3 from '../../SiteButtons/Button3/Button3' import SiteHeadline from '../../SiteHeadline/SiteHeadline' import { ReduxLoginForm } from '../../Forms/Login/Login' const SignPage=(props)=>{ const onSubmit=(formData)=>{ debugger props.login(formData.email,formData.password) props.register(formData.name,formData.email,formData.password) } return( <>
) } export default SignPage
